mapper.select: select pao.no, pao.pro_option_code, pro_option_name, pao.pro_option_detail_code,pro_option_detail_name from pro_add_option pao, pro_option po, pro_option_detail pod where pao.pro_option_code = po.pro_option_code and pao.pro_option_detail_code = pod.pro_option_detail_code and pro_no=#{no}

select no from pro_add_option WHERE pro_option_code = (SELECT pro_option_code FROM pro_option WHERE pro_option_name = (SELECT cart_option FROM cart WHERE no= #{no})) AND pro_option_detail_code = (SELECT pro_option_detail_code FROM pro_option_detail WHERE pro_option_detail_name = (SELECT cart_option_detail FROM cart WHERE no= #{no})) AND pro_no = #{pro_no}

select no from pro_add_option WHERE pro_option_code = (SELECT pro_option_code FROM pro_option WHERE pro_option_name = #{pro_option_name}) AND pro_option_detail_code = (SELECT pro_option_detail_code FROM pro_option_detail WHERE pro_option_detail_name = #{pro_option_detail_name}) AND pro_no = #{pro_no}
